title: (x) Funky unicase display font - P22 Sniplash {Stuart}
content:
Is this a font? :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112115249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GIFT-SET-06_01.gif)

Thanks for your help! :)
author: Cerilene Hazel

comments.content: Hi Cerilene - alphabet looks good - a bit of fun - rather well done - balanced - good and original - distinctive. What help?
\*L\* Oops, sorry Chris! :) Is this a font? :-D

Yes, I believe that's it Stuart. :) Thank you very much :)

Paul, it's a [scrapbooking product](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112115249/http:/www.quickutz.com/giftset.asp?CartId=&ic=GIFT-SET-06&eq=&Tp=&selProduct=GiftSet&Show=new). :) You may remember [the thread Miss Tiffany posted](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112115249/http:/typophile.com/node/18640) awhile back ID'ing a bunch of fonts from a scrapbook company. This is just one of their new fonts! :)
